name: H55 SA
goal: Develop certified electric propulsion solution to make air transport clean and safe.
euInitiatives: Following a meeting at a World Economic Forum event in China in the autumn of 2018 between Commissioner Modeas and André Borschberg, H55 Co-Founder+Executive Chairman, the commissioner invited H55 to meet to discuss the company's view on the future development of electric and clean aviation, new aviation transport concepts and designs and the various challenge associated with urban mobility. on the latter issues of infrastructure, battery safety and certification was discussed.
